授業方法: Each session will consist of several different activities. Most sessions will begin with a short vocabulary quiz, followed by a short listening task, such as a dictation or listening comprehension. Then, in small groups, students will share their written homework assignments. Following this, students will do individual, pair, and group work using the textbook. Then, if time allows, students will engage in some communicative activity that builds upon the content of the textbook. However, some sessions will have written quizzes on the textbook content, English skit performances, or speaking tests in place of the regular activities.
